item.description: The denoiser needs to see both big picture and fine details.

item.title: Building Diffusion Models (3/7): The Noise Process
item.description: Diffusion’s key insight: destroying structure is easy (add noise), creating structure is hard.

item.title: Building Diffusion Models (2/7): Neural Network Basics
item.description: Neural networks learn to denoise images. Before building a full diffusion model, understand the building blocks: conv layers, activations, residual connections.

item.title: Building Diffusion Models (1/7): Understanding Tensors
item.description: Before diving into diffusion models, master the foundation: tensors. Every image is a tensor.
